name: NBCNews
text: New short film "Out" features Pixar's first gay main character - @NBCOUT https://t.co/IVrxCXa3rY

name: NBCNews
text: State Sen. Brad Hoylman, whose district includes many of New York City's historically gay neighborhoods, said he was "turned away for being gay" when he tried to donate blood at the New York Blood Center, even though he meets the new FDA criteria. https://t.co/iv4P4ILv6s
